title: Chris Stapleton Performs 'Starting Over' In Studio + 'Fun Fact Friday' Challenge! + Bobby’s Mailbag: Fiancé Wants To Keep Maiden Name
itunes:title: Chris Stapleton Performs 'Starting Over' In Studio + 'Fun Fact Friday' Challenge! + Bobby’s Mailbag: Fiancé Wants To Keep Maiden Name
description:
Chris Stapleton is in as the Friday Morning Conversation. Bobby steps in for Amy on Fun Fact Friday and then challenges Eddie and Lunchbox to find 5 facts and battle against each other. In the mailbag, a guy writes into the mailbag on why he has a problem with his wife not wanting to change her last name after they get married.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
